doc.after: Shaw and Crompton has communal areas and public facilities, including public parks, sporting establishments, and playing fields. Public houses in the centre of the town include The Shay Wake (a mill town-themed J D Wetherspoon pub, named after the Shaw Wakes week),[120] The Blue Bell, Duke of York, Coach and Horses, and The Pineapple.[121] Outlying public houses include the Royal Oak at Cowlishaw, and the Park Inn at Buckstones Road.[121]
